articles.author: Francesca Stevens, Nguyen Dieu Tu Uyen
articles.title: Vietnam Gains Edge With Early Trump Deal, US Group Head Says - Bloomberg
articles.description: Vietnam’s race to secure a trade deal with the Trump administration, even if the details aren’t clear, gives the Southeast Asian country an advantage over regional rivals, according to Ted Osius, president of the US-Asean Business Council.
